title: Data Visualization
text:
What This Visualization Shows

The Data
Describe the dataset you visualized:

Source: Where did the data come from? (e.g., course project, research, public dataset)
Time Period: When was this data collected?
Sample Size: How many data points or observations?
Variables: What variables are being visualized?



Key Insights
Explain what the visualization reveals:

Main Finding 1: [Describe what stands out]
Main Finding 2: [Another important pattern or trend]
Surprising Discovery: [Something unexpected you noticed]


‚ÄúData visualization is not just about making pretty charts‚Äîit‚Äôs about revealing truth hidden in numbers.‚Äù

title: Data Visualization
text:

What course or project was this for?

When did you create this? (which semester/year)

What message did you want to convey?

text:

I chose [chart type] because:

Reason 1
Reason 2
It best represents [what aspect of the data]

Alternative Approaches Considered

title: Welcome
text:
Hello! I‚Äôm Anushka, a passionate student at Singapore Institute of Technology.
Year 1 Applied Computing (FinTech) student at Singapore Institute of Technology, specialising in blockchain development and AI applications. Actively participates in various hackathons and competitions, demonstrating fast learning and hands-on experience building decentralised systems. Passionate about leveraging programming expertise to solve complex problems at the intersection of technology and finance, with a particular interest in Web3 infrastructure and AI-powered financial solutions.

‚ÄúKindling a flame, not filling a vessel.‚Äù
‚Äî Socrates

title: Welcome
text:
What You‚Äôll Find Here
This website is a collection of my academic journey, creative work, and reflections:
My Project explores EverFlow, a blockchain-based supply chain solution I developed.
Data Visualization showcases my work in stock market trend analysis using Python and Seaborn.
GenAI Reflection shares my honest experience and thoughts on using artificial intelligence tools in my learning journey.


Connect With Me


GitHub: anushka203769
Email: anushkanavneetchourasia@gmail.com



‚ÄúLearning is a journey, not a destination.‚Äù``

title: Reflection on the Use of GenAI
text: ‚ÄúTechnology is best when it brings people together and enhances human capability.‚Äù

title: Reflection on the Use of GenAI
text:
Introduction
This reflection documents my honest experience using Generative AI tools to complete this web portfolio assessment. I share both the benefits and challenges I encountered, along with my thoughts on AI‚Äôs role in education.

title: Reflection on the Use of GenAI
text:
The AI Tool I Used

Tool Selection
Primary Tool: [Name of GenAI tool - e.g., Claude, ChatGPT, etc.]
Why I Chose This Tool:
Write your genuine reasons here: - Reason 1 (e.g., Accessibility, features, recommendations) - Reason 2 (e.g., Previous experience, capabilities) - Reason 3 (e.g., Specific strengths for this task)


Other Tools Considered
Did you consider other AI tools? Why did you choose this one over others?

title: Reflection on the Use of GenAI
text:
How GenAI Helped Me

Specific Examples
Be honest and specific about how the AI assisted you:
Example 1: [Task Name - e.g., Website Styling]
Describe what you needed help with and how the AI helped: - What was your goal? - What prompt did you use? - What did the AI provide? - How did you use or adapt the output?
Example 2: [Task Name - e.g., Content Structuring]
Another specific instance: - The challenge you faced - How you asked the AI for help - The assistance provided - Your modifications or customizations
Example 3: [Task Name - e.g., Technical Problem-Solving]
A third concrete example: - The problem - The AI‚Äôs suggestion - How it worked out

title: Reflection on the Use of GenAI
text:
Benefits of Using GenAI

What Worked Well
Reflect on the positive aspects:

Efficiency: How did it save you time?
Learning: Did it help you understand concepts better?
Creativity: Did it inspire ideas you wouldn‚Äôt have thought of?
Problem-Solving: How did it help you overcome obstacles?



Unexpected Advantages
What surprised you positively about using GenAI?

Unexpected benefit 1
Unexpected benefit 2


Share a memorable quote or realization you had while using the AI.

title: Reflection on the Use of GenAI
text:

What Didn‚Äôt Work Well
Be honest about the difficulties:
Challenge 1: [Name the issue]

Challenge 2: [Another challenge]

Challenge 3: [Learning curve or other issue]

The Learning Curve

Was it easy to use effectively?
Did you need to learn how to prompt it better?
What mistakes did you make initially?

title: Reflection on the Use of GenAI

Did I Actually Learn?
Critically reflect on whether using AI helped or hindered your learning:

Knowledge I Gained: - What did you understand better after using AI? - What did you learn that you wouldn‚Äôt have otherwise?
Areas Where I Might Have Missed Out: - Be honest: What might you have learned better by struggling without AI?

text:

What questions remain?
